File /obj/service_provider.c

The service provider object. It is designed to be similar to the peddler object, only instead of selling objects, it sells services instead.

Written by Furcifer March 2000

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /obj/monster.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/armoury.h, /include/shops/bank.h, /include/money.h and /include/move_failures.h

                        string func,

Parameters:

Returns:
